dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The MS Westerdam, with 1,500 passengers, was turned away from multiple Asian ports over coronavirus concerns.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The M S Westerdam, with fifteen hundred passengers, was turned away from multiple Asian ports over coronavirus concerns.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A cruise ship that was turned away from several ports in Asia over coronavirus fearsdespite no cases onboardwill now dock in Cambodia after days of uncertainty and mounting anxiety among passengers. Stephen Hansen and his wife are two of the 1,500 passengers stuck on the vessel, which sailed from Hong Kong on February 1st and had been scheduled to end its cruise in Japan on February 15.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, despite Holland America Line insisting there are no cases on that ship. They were just stuck out there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, despite Holland America Line insisting there are no cases on that ship. They were just stuck out there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Holland America Line, which is owned by Carnival Cruise, says nobody onboard has reported symptoms. All guests on board are healthy and despite erroneous reports there are no known or suspected cases of coronavirus on board, nor have their ever been.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Cambodia's actually letting them dock in Sihanoukville on Friday, which is a huge relief for everyone onboard.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Cambodia's actually letting them dock in Sihanoukville on Friday, which is a huge relief for everyone onboard.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It will now dock in Sihanoukville in Cambodia on Thursday, where passengers will disembark over a few day and will be transported to the capital, Phnom Penh, and flown home.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, can you imagine the anxiety? Passengers like Stephen Hansen and his wife have been on board since it left Hong Kong on January 31st.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, can you imagine the anxiety? Passengers like Stephen Hansen and his wife have been on board since it left Hong Kong on January thirty first.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Stephen Hansen and his wife are two of the 1,500 passengers stuck on the vessel, which sailed from Hong Kong on February 1st and had been scheduled to end its cruise in Japan on February 15.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he told Forbes that countries turning them away were acting on fear, not facts—which is understandable but still really tough for those stuck at sea.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he told Forbes that countries turning them away were acting on fear, not facts-which is understandable but still really tough for those stuck at sea.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Hansen told Forbes: While I can understand that countries want to protect their own citizens first before helping us their decisions to turn us away are based more on misinformation and fear than facts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The company's refunding their entire trip and paying for flights home from Phnom Penh, so at least there's that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The company's refunding their entire trip and paying for flights home from Phnom Penh, so at least there's that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Holland America Line says it will pay for the flight sand refund passengers their entire trip.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But it's wild how cruise ships have become this flashpoint in the whole outbreak. Like the Diamond Princess quarantined near Tokyo with over a hundred cases.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's wild how cruise ships have become this flashpoint in the whole outbreak. Like the Diamond Princess quarantined near Tokyo with over a hundred cases.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The British-owned Diamond Princess cruise was quarantined in Tokyo last Monday, with 174 out of the 3,700 passengers on board now ill with the pneumonia-like illness.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And now with Covid-19 infecting over 42,000 people globally, the fear is just spreading faster than the virus itself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And now with Covidminus nineteen infecting over forty two thousand people globally, the fear is just spreading faster than the virus itself.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coronavirus, this week renamed Covid-19, has now killed more than 1,000 people and infected at least 42,000 more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: One passenger even mentioned they were being escorted by a Thai naval ship at one point—just adds to the drama of it all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: One passenger even mentioned they were being escorted by a Thai naval ship at one point-just adds to the drama of it all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Twitter, another passenger on the MS Westerdam tweeted that the vessel was being escorted by a naval ship, the Thai Navy frigate Bhumibol Adulyadej.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's a reminder how these global health crises ripple out and affect travel, trade… real people's lives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a reminder how these global health crises ripple out and affect travel, trade... real people's lives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hopefully this docking means a smooth resolution for everyone involved. What a situation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hopefully this docking means a smooth resolution for everyone involved. What a situation.
